name: Plane Simulator Prototype
description:
Controls: Up / Down Arrow keys or W,S, to steer the plane up or down. Controls are inverted.

Purpose of Plane Simulator Prototype

  • Write a script that allows user to steer a plane while it moves forward continuously
  • Rotate the propeller

Methodology:

  • C# Scripting in Visual Studio:\
    • Get the user's vertical input with Input.GetAxis
    • Use transform.Translate to move the plane constantly
    • Use transform.Rotate to rotate the plane and the propeller
